document.full_text: north korea's leader kim jong-il toured east china on monday, continuing a secretive visit that has highlighted the bond between his isolated regime and asia's biggest economy.
document.title: north korea's kim tours east china with economic ties in focus
lines_and_colors: north korea's leader kim jong-il toured east china on monday, continuing a secretive visit that has highlighted the bond between his isolated regime and asia's biggest economy.
